Job Title: Looking For Java developer For  Ramer Software Solutions
Job Description: Greetings of the day from Ramer Software Solutions We are Looking For Java developer For  Ramer Software Solutions, VIZAG Please find below Job description for reference.The ideal candidate should have- A passion for technology and the Food Industry domain with demonstrated ability to learn quickly- Delivery focus with the ability to take full ownership- Strong commitment to quality, documentation and engineering excellence- Strong communication skills, problem solving skills and adaptability- Experience in reverse engineering and understanding existing applications Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization- Excellent collaboration and Interpersonal skills- Great attitude, being a mentor, team player and effective contributor- Focused on productivity Skills/ Knowledge and experience- Java/ J2EE Object Oriented design and development skills- Java IDEs (Eclipse, Intelli)- Java SE, Servlets/ JSP, Spring MVC- Web Services (SOAP, REST)_ Experience in AWS (added advantage )
